thread.title: Liverpool player ratings: Can and Klavan have shockers as Liverpool stumble against Saints
thread.title_full: Liverpool player ratings: Can and Klavan have shockers as Liverpool stumble against Saints

title: Liverpool player ratings: Can and Klavan have shockers as Liverpool stumble against Saints
text: Liverpool player ratings: Can and Klavan have shockers as Liverpool stumble against Saints LIVERPOOL were stunned by Southampton in the first leg of their EFL Cup semi-final, but who was to blame for the Reds' 1-0 defeat? PUBLISHED: 21:19,  43, Wed, Jan 11, 2017 Liverpool player ratings against Southampton in the EFL Cup Wed, January 11, 2017 Express Sport rates the Liverpool players after the first leg of their EFL Cup semi-final with Southampton at St Mary's
